verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God, <WG2316> according to <WG2596> the promise <WG1860> of the life <WG2222> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>

to Timothy, <WG5095> my beloved <WG27> child: <WG5043> Grace, <WG5485> mercy, <WG1656> and peace, <WG1515> from <WG575> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>

I <WG2192> thank <WG5485> God, <WG2316> whom <WG3739> I serve <WG3000> as <WG575> my forefathers <WG4269> did, <WG1722> with a pure <WG2513> conscience. <WG4893> How <WG5613> unceasing <WG88> is my <WG2192> memory <WG3417> of <WG4012> you <WG4675> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> petitions, <WG1162> night <WG3571> and <WG2532> day <WG2250>
longing <WG1971> to see <WG1492> you, <WG4571> remembering <WG3415> your <WG4675> tears, <WG1144> that <WG2443> I may be filled <WG4137> with joy; <WG5479>

having been <WG2983> reminded <WG5280> of the sincere <WG505> faith <WG4102> that is <WG3588> in <WG1722> you; <WG4671> which <WG3748> lived <WG1774> first <WG4412> in <WG1722> your <WG4675> grandmother <WG3125> Lois, <WG3090> and <WG2532> your <WG4675> mother <WG3384> Eunice, <WG2131> and, <WG1161> I am persuaded, <WG3982> <WG3754> in <WG1722> you <WG4671> also. <WG2532>

For this <WG1223> cause, <WG363> I remind <WG363> you <WG4571> that you should stir up <WG329> the gift <WG5486> of God <WG2316> which <WG3739> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> you <WG4671> through <WG1223> the laying on <WG1936> of my <WG3450> hands. <WG156>

For <WG1063> God <WG2316> <WG1325> didn't <WG3756> give <WG1325> us <WG2254> a spirit <WG4151> of fear, <WG1167> but <WG235> of power, <WG1411> <WG2532> love, <WG26> and <WG2532> self-control. <WG4995>

Therefore <WG3767> don't <WG3361> be <WG1870> ashamed of <WG1870> the testimony <WG3142> of our <WG2257> Lord, <WG2962> nor <WG3366> of me <WG1691> his <WG846> prisoner; <WG1198> but <WG235> endure hardship <WG4777> for the Good News <WG2098> according to <WG2596> the power <WG1411> of God, <WG2316>

who saved <WG4982> us <WG2248> and <WG2532> called <WG2564> us with a holy <WG40> calling, <WG2821> not <WG3756> according to <WG2596> our <WG2257> works, <WG2041> but <WG235> according to <WG2596> his own <WG2398> purpose <WG4286> and <WG2532> grace, <WG5485> which was given <WG1325> to us <WG2254> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> before <WG4253> times <WG166> eternal, <WG5550>

but <WG1161> has <WG5319> now <WG3568> been revealed <WG5319> by <WG1223> the appearing <WG2015> of our <WG2257> Savior, <WG4990> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> who abolished <WG2673> death, <WG2288> and <WG1161> brought <WG5461> life <WG2222> and <WG2532> immortality <WG861> to light <WG5461> through <WG1223> the Good News. <WG2098>
For <WG3739> this, <WG1519> I <WG1473> was appointed <WG5087> as a preacher, <WG2783> an <WG2532> apostle, <WG652> and <WG2532> a teacher <WG1320> of the Gentiles. <WG1484>

For <WG1223> this <WG3739> cause I <WG3958> also <WG2532> suffer these things. <WG5023> Yet <WG235> I am <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed, <WG1870> for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> him whom <WG3739> I have believed, <WG4100> and <WG2532> I am persuaded <WG3982> that <WG3754> he is <WG2076> able <WG1415> to guard <WG5442> that which <WG3866> I <WG3450> have committed <WG3866> to him against <WG1519> that <WG1565> day. <WG156>

Hold <WG2192> the pattern <WG5296> of sound <WG5198> words <WG3056> which <WG3739> you have heard <WG191> from <WG3844> me, <WG1700> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
That <WG3588> good thing <WG2570> which was committed to you, <WG3872> guard <WG5442> through <WG1223> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> who dwells <WG1774> in <WG1722> us. <WG2254>

This <WG5124> you know, <WG1492> that <WG3754> all <WG3956> who are <WG3588> in <WG1722> Asia <WG773> turned away from <WG654> me; <WG3165> of whom <WG3739> are <WG2076> Phygelus <WG5436> and <WG2532> Hermogenes. <WG2061>

May the Lord <WG2962> grant <WG1325> mercy <WG1656> to the house <WG3624> of Onesiphorus, <WG3683> for <WG3754> he <WG404> often <WG4178> refreshed <WG404> me, <WG3165> and <WG2532> was <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> of my <WG3450> chain, <WG254>
but <WG235> when he was <WG1096> in <WG1722> Rome, <WG4516> he sought <WG2212> me <WG3165> diligently, <WG4706> and <WG2532> found <WG2147> me <WG3165>

(the Lord <WG2962> grant <WG1325> to him <WG846> to find <WG2147> the <WG3844> Lord <WG2962>'s mercy <WG1656> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>); and <WG2532> in how many things <WG3745> he served <WG1247> at <WG1722> Ephesus, <WG2181> you <WG4771> know <WG1097> very well. <WG957>
